column1:
The mango and rasmalai falooda didn't have any ice cream in it. this should be specified as ice cream is considered an essential component of falooda.

the kesar falooda was delicious

Malai Kulfi was amazing and can feel the Mawa in it.
8 in 1 Kulfi was also very very good
less quantity with no thickness in coffee texture
It had mawa in it which I do not like in Falooda. Too thick.
